name: Teleportal FPS
description:
A short puzzle FPS centered around shooting and teleporting. It's about 15-20 minutes in length. This is the result of me making a game in a month. I had an idea for a teleport mechanic that I hadn't seen a lot of other games do, so I decided to make a prototype. You create a stationary orb that you can teleport to at any time. Try to reach the end of the level.

You can watch the creation of this project and get updates on future projects by subscribing to my Youtube and Rumble channels.

https://rumble.com/c/FreeComet

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLQFH8v2IgtPfHzVKRLjXlA
